original_title: Milos Forman, un outsider Ã  Hollywood
overview: Milos Forman and guests look at his career from his departing Czechoslovakia and his arrival in America with stories and interviews about The Fireman's Ball, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Amadeus, The People Vs Larry Flynt, and The Man on the Moon.
title: Milos Forman Taking Off in America
